name: Checkers and Dices
description:
An online multiplayer game were you roll your dices to get 2 random numbers, then you put your checkers in places based on the dices numbers, the first player to stack 4 checkers vertically, horizontally or inclined win the game.

hope you enjoy it, and thanks for playing.

for contact or feedback: gamesdevs@zoho.com

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Alpha_Dragon
